com.paydiant.android.core.domain

Class UserCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.domain.UserCredentials

  • public class UserCredentials
extends Object
    The Class UserCredentials. The domain object which holds the user credentials.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserCredentials()
      The default constructor for user credentials mostly for use by the JSON libraries.
      UserCredentials(String pin)
      Instantiates a new user credentials.
      UserCredentials(String username, String password)
      The constructor which is used to populate this object most of the time.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getPassword()
      Get password encrypts the String using the Sha512 algorithm and returns it.
      String getPin()
      Get PIN encrypts the pin using the SHA512 algorithm and returns it.
      String getUsername()
      Gets the username.
      void setPassword(String password)
      Sets the password.
      void setPin(String pin)
      Sets the pin.
      void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the username.
      void validatePin()
      This method validates that the pin is not null or a empty string.
      void validateUsernamePassword()
      This method validates the username and password to ensure that they are not null or empty.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserCredentials

        public UserCredentials()
        The default constructor for user credentials mostly for use by the JSON libraries. initially the pin_encrypted and password_encrypted is set to false

      • UserCredentials

        public UserCredentials(String username,
               String password)
        The constructor which is used to populate this object most of the time.
        Parameters:
        username - - The User name of the user attempting to login
        password - - The password of the user attempting to login

      • UserCredentials

        public UserCredentials(String pin)
        Instantiates a new user credentials.
        Parameters:
        pin - the pin

    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        public String getUsername()
        Gets the username.
        Returns:
        the username

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(String username)
        Sets the username.
        Parameters:
        username - the new username

      • getPassword

        public String getPassword()
        Get password encrypts the String using the Sha512 algorithm and returns it. If the password is empty or null just return it without encrypting
        Returns:
        the password

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(String password)
        Sets the password.
        Parameters:
        password - the new password

      • getPin

        public String getPin()
        Get PIN encrypts the pin using the SHA512 algorithm and returns it. if the pin is empty or null just return it without encrypting.
        Returns:
        the pin

      • setPin

        public void setPin(String pin)
        Sets the pin.
        Parameters:
        pin - the new pin

      • validatePin

        public void validatePin()
        This method validates that the pin is not null or a empty string. if not PaydiantClientException is thrown

      • validateUsernamePassword

        public void validateUsernamePassword()
        This method validates the username and password to ensure that they are not null or empty. if not PaydiantClientException is thrown
